name: LAVA
description:
[This is an one man work, so, remember this while judging]

[Please leave feedback]

[Curent version include only 3 levels]

Ladies and Gentlemans, welcome to Lava! World's first Run N' Jump game show, starring the deadly and hot Lava, and the Runners, Which have to get to the end of the track, avoiding obstacles, before the lava reach them.

Lava is an First Person Run N' Jump rage game where your objective is to reach the end of the track, avoiding obstacles, before the lava gets you.
